tns:patch.author: acartaleanu
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_calculated_project_life;
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_calculated_project_life AS SELECT amp_activity_id, rawval AS calculated_project_life FROM (SELECT amp_activity_id, To_char(actual_completion_date, 'J') :: Integer - To_char(proposed_start_date, 'J') :: Integer AS rawval FROM amp_activity_version) AS rawvals WHERE rawval IS NOT NULL;
